fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Convert a player to Locust X, the only thing that stops this is conversion immunity.
- If there are 4 members, you may attack someone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If too many people are attempting to be converted, a random conversion will succeed until the cap is reached. All other targets will be attacked.
- If your target has access to a factional chat, they become Espionage. They keep the abilities and attributes of their original role, you learn them, they learn you, but you cannot whisper to them or vice versa. They keep access to that factional chat.
